mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_image (product_image_path, product_image_folder, product_image_file_name , product_image_file_real_name, product_image_product_no, product_thumbnail) VALUES (#{productImagePath}, #{productImageFolder}, #{productImageFileName} , #{productImageFileRealName}, #{productImageProductNo}, #{productThumbnail})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (@ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1) rn, tbl.* FROM ( SELECT i.product_image_product_no, i.product_image_folder, i.product_image_file_name, c.category_no FROM product p LEFT JOIN product_image i ON p.product_no = i.product_image_product_no LEFT JOIN category c ON p.product_category_no = c.category_no LEFT JOIN favorite f ON c.category_no = f.favorite_category_no WHERE i.product_thumbnail = 1 AND f.favorite_user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY p.product_reg_date DESC ) tbl, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R ) tbl2 LIMIT 9

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (@ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1) rn, tbl.* FROM ( SELECT i.product_image_folder, i.product_image_file_name, i.product_image_product_no, c.category_no, MAX(b.board_views) board_views FROM product p LEFT JOIN product_image i ON p.product_no = i.product_image_product_no LEFT JOIN category c ON p.product_category_no = c.category_no LEFT JOIN board b ON b.board_category_no = c.category_no WHERE i.product_thumbnail = 1 GROUP BY i.product_image_product_no, i.product_image_folder, i.product_image_file_name, c.category_no ORDER BY board_views DESC ) tbl, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R ) tbl2 LIMIT 9
